name: burnout
content:

the state of having no energy or enthusiasm because of working too hard, or someone who shows the effects of this state: [ U ] We have found there is much more burnout and sickness among those who don't get help. [ C ] The drummer walked in looking like a rock and roll burnout.

HR extreme tiredness or a feeling of not being able to work any more, caused by working too hard: Long and unpredictable work hours have led to burnout and frustration.
